name: openbao
description: OpenBao is a community-driven fork of HashiCorp Vault designed for secure secret management. It supports encryption, key management, access control, and API-driven workflows in self-hosted environments.

features.title: REST API
features.description: Store and manage sensitive data like passwords, API keys, and certificates with encryption at rest

features.title: Access Control
features.description: Implement fine-grained policies and role-based access control for secure secret distribution

features.title: End-to-End Encryption
features.description: Provide encryption-as-a-service for applications without exposing encryption keys to clients

features.title: Authentication Methods
features.description: Support multiple authentication backends including LDAP, OAuth, and certificate-based auth

features.title: Audit Logging
features.description: Maintain detailed logs of all secret access and operations for compliance and security monitoring

features.title: Api Integration
features.description: Access all functionality through comprehensive REST APIs for automation and application integration
